core_details.description: Between CO 340 and US 50 (Grand Junction) from Mile Point 5 to Mile Point 5.7. Road construction. Starting August 15, 2025 at 7:00AM MDT until August 15, 2025 at about 7:00PM MDT. Full schedule below: • August 15, 7:00AM - August 15, 7:00PM Comment: The West Main Street and East Main Street intersections remain closed for concrete paving.
